an11.5:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma anando bhikkhu amantesi …pe…
an11.5:1.3: avippatisare asati avippatisaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti pamojjam,
an11.5:1.4: pamojje asati pamojjavipannassa hatupanisa hoti piti,
an11.5:1.5: pitiya asati pitivipannassa hatupanisa hoti passaddhi,
an11.5:1.6: passaddhiya asati passaddhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti sukham,
an11.5:1.7: sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi,
an11.5:1.8: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam,
an11.5:1.9: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupanisa hoti nibbida,
an11.5:1.10: nibbidaya asati nibbidavipannassa hatupaniso hoti virago,
an11.5:1.11: virage asati viragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an11.5:2.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, rukkho sakhapalasavipanno. Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi na paripurim gacchati.
an11.5:2.2: Evamevam kho, avuso, dussilassa silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti avippatisaro,
an11.5:2.3: avippatisare asati avippatisaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti pamojjam …pe…
an11.5:3.1: Silavato, avuso, silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippatisaro,
an11.5:3.2: avippatisare sati avippatisarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti pamojjam,
an11.5:3.3: pamojje sati pamojjasampannassa upanisasampanna hoti piti,
an11.5:3.4: pitiya sati pitisampannassa upanisasampanna hoti passaddhi,
an11.5:3.5: passaddhiya sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti sukham,
an11.5:3.6: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi,
an11.5:3.7: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam,
an11.5:3.8: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanna hoti nibbida,
an11.5:3.9: nibbidaya sati nibbidasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti virago,
an11.5:3.10: virage sati viragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an11.5:4.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, rukkho sakhapalasasampanno. Tassa papatikapi paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi paripurim gacchati.
an11.5:4.2: Evamevam kho, avuso, silavato silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippatisaro,
an11.5:4.3: avippatisare sati avippatisarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti pamojjam …pe…
